title: Destiny Update Details King’s Fall Hard Mode, Fixes Nightfall & Shadowshot
text:
Destiny Update Details King’s Fall Hard Mode, Fixes Nightfall & Shadowshot 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Today 
Bungie releases a Destiny hot fix today, preparing the game for King's Fall's Hard Mode on Friday and patching Nightfall rewards and the Sha...
